title: Dax
creator_credit: Antony Barrier and Mary Glasgow Audio-Visual
brief_description: This film tells the story of two teenage girls who arrive for a few days holiday at Dax, a thermal station in the Pyrenees Department of Lands. The narration and conversation are in simple, easy to understand French.
